meanings.sent1: In georgics, students learn about farming practices and crop cultivation.
meanings.sent2: The georgics course covers various aspects of agricultural science.
meanings.sent3: The professor's passion for georgics made even the most boring topics interesting.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of georgics blossomed like a well-tended garden.
meanings.sent5: The textbook on georgics was filled with colorful illustrations of different crops.

meanings.definition: A poem or literary work on agriculture and rural life
meanings.sent1: The georgics of ancient poets celebrated the beauty of the countryside.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed reading the georgics of famous writers from the past.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled at the rhymes in the georgics they were assigned to read.
meanings.sent4: His words in the georgics painted a vivid picture of rural landscapes.
meanings.sent5: The georgics she wrote captured the essence of farm life with lyrical charm.
